author: IGN
description: Experience Madden NFL 26 like never before with 22 minutes of pure gameplay action, captured in breathtaking 4K resolution at a silky smooth 60FPS on the PlayStation 5 Pro. Watch every play, tackle, and touchdown come to life with stunning visuals and crisp performance. Whether you're a longtime fan or new to the game, this extended gameplay session showcases the next-level graphics and fluid mechanics Madden NFL 26 has to offer.
title: Madden NFL 26 - 22 Minutes of PS5 Pro Gameplay | 4K 60FPS

author: IGN
description: Watch the Demo Trailer for Super Robot Wars Y, an RPG simulation strategy game developed by Bandi Namco Forge Digitals. Players will set out to pummel the opposition with powerful mechs in sweet anime fashion. Get a look at the demo for Chapter 1 of Super Wars Robot Y, launching on August 28 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).
title: Super Robot Wars Y - Official Demo Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
In light of Sony's lawsuit, megapublisher Tencent has changed some of the assets on the Steam page for Light of Motiram. The game fell into Sony's crosshairs for looking a lot like their Horizon Zero Dawn games, and judging by some of those marketing assets, Sony might have a case. Tencent has changed the description and some of the art featuring a female protagonist that looks an awful lot like Horizon's Aloy, as well as easing up on mentions of giant mechanical beasts. In other news, Bethesda's Starfield may finally be giving fans what they want: the ability to fly between planets. Although not officially announced, the new 'feature' won't be exactly like No Man's Sky's key feature of letting you take off from a planet's surface, fly into space, through the atmosphere of another planet, and onto that surface without an obvious loading screen. Starfield is getting a PS5 port sometime next year, and could see some new feaures added, like the aforementioned 'flyin
title: Light of Motiram's Steam Page Quietly Altered by Tencent After Sony Lawsuit - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
thatgamecompany, the award-winning studio behind Sky: Children of the Light, presents The Two Embers: Part One, the first part of a wordless animated feature revealing the long-awaited origin story of Sky, a once-thriving kingdom of stars nestled in the clouds.

The Two Embers unfolds across two parts, following the parallel journeys of two children. Though separated by time, their fates are deeply intertwined, and together, their choices will shape the destiny of a crumbling kingdom.

The Two Embers – Part 1 follows the poignant tale of an orphan chasing hope in a world slowly succumbing to darkness. Told entirely without dialogue, the story unfolds as a series of animated chapters players can watch together in-game, with each chapter accompanied by playable Seasonal Quests that place players directly into the events of a kingdom’s final days.

At the heart of the journey is a gentle, expressive manatee, a companion who responds to players’ actions and stands by their side through th
title: Sky: The Two Embers - Part 1 Official Trailer (2025)

author: IGN
description:
We checked out FX’s Alien: Earth experience at Comic-Con and got to chat with series creator Noah Hawley. We discussed his approach to the show and what it was like working with such an iconic franchise. FX’s Alien: Earth premieres 8.12 on FX | Hulu.

FX: Alien Earth stars Sydney Chandler, Timothy Olyphant, Alex Lawther, Samuel Blenkin, Essie Davis, and Adarsh Gourav. 

Presented by FX's Alien: Earth

#IGN #SDCC
title: Noah Hawley Reveals His Process in Creating FX’s Alien: Earth | SDCC 2025

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at 'The Mesa Update' Release Date Teaser Trailer for Peak, a co-op climbing game developed by Team Peak. Players will set out to scale the top of a mountain by any means necessary. A new biome is being introduced with the upcoming Mesa Update that takes players to the desert sporting that summer heat and plenty of cacti to go around. The Mesa Update for Peak is launching on August 11 for PC (Steam).

#ign #PeakTheMesaUpdate
title: Peak - Official 'The Mesa Update' Release Date Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Accolades Trailer for Mafia: The Old Country, the latest installment in the third-person action-adventure franchise developed by Hangar 13. Players will explore the birth of the Mafia and organized crime itself in the underworld of 1900s Sicily as Enzo Favara. Take a look at the latest trailer to garner the critical reception behind Mafia: The Old Country, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#ign #MafiaTheOldCountry
title: Mafia: The Old Country - Official Accolades Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Battlefield 6 Beta is underway as of August 7th, and if you’re trying to access it during the first 48 hours, you need to have an early access code. Activating this code for your preferred system is a bit confusing, so here’s a quick rundown on how to access the Battlefield 6 Beta during its closed early access period and afterwards during its open access.

Timestamps:
00:00 - Intro
00:23 - Battlefield 6 Beta Weekend Info
01:02 - How to Get A Battlefield 6 Beta Early Access Code
01:41 - How to Use Your Battlefield 6 Beta Early Access Code
01:59 - How to Link Your EA Account to PlayStation, Xbox and Steam
03:01 - Outro
title: Battlefield 6 Beta: Dates, Early Access Codes, and How to Join

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at gameplay and more from Aksun in this trailer for the upcoming Korean roguelite based on Shamanic mythos. A playtest for Aksun will be available on Steam and Humble Bundle on August 15, 2025, with sign-ups now open.

In Aksun, players are trapped within the Casket - a cursed device forged to imprison the will of a fallen cult and its monstrous prophet. Each run drives you deeper into a cycle of memory, suffering, and rebirth, offering new weapons, corrupted artifacts, and stat-shaping Echoes to master.

#IGN #Aksun #Shamanic
title: Aksun - Official Playtest Announce Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Narrated Gameplay Trailer for Guntouchables, a co-op roguelite action shooter developed by Game Swing. 

Players will take on a ruined world as preppers who are armed to the teeth with an arsenal ready for all engagements. Collect crates to upgrade your weaponry, attain perks for enhanced abilities, and more. Guntouchables is available now for PC (Steam).

#IGN #Guntouchables #Shooters
title: Guntouchables - Official Narrated Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Cinematic Hero Trailer for Dungeon Stalkers, an upcoming PvPvE dungeon crawling game developed by OneUniverse Co. 

Players will take up arms with each other to slay monsters, attain the fruits of new equipment and treasures, and return safely from vast adventures from the witch's curse. Don't miss the latest cinematic trailer highlighting the playable heroes for Dungeon Stalkers, launching into Early Access on August 13 for PC (Steam).

#IGN #DungeonStalkers #PvPvE
title: Dungeon Stalkers - Official Cinematic Hero Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Following up his genre-bending 2022 horror debut Barbarian, writer/director Zach Cregger returns with Weapons, which traces the fallout of a horrific disappearance in a small town. Cregger - as well as cast members Julia Garner, Alden Ehrenreich, and Josh Brolin - explains how he crafted the interweaving narrative, which gives each character's perspective a unique role in unraveling the mystery, and how he chose to represent their subconscious minds during the film's surreal nightmare sequences. 

#IGN #Movies
title: Weapons: How Zach Cregger Uses Nightmares and Non-Linear Storytelling to Explore Tragedy

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Season 17 Content Update Overview Trailer for Sea of Thieves, the hit multiplayer action RPG developed by Rare. 

Players can get acquainted with new content to interface with in Season 17 for Sea of Thieves, including new loot, refreshed Forts for a greater challenge, and the arrival of Smugglers' League for a more competitive feel with payouts to attain. Progress through 100 Levels of rewards to unlock in Season 17 for Sea of Thieves, launching on August 14 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Xbox PC, Xbox Cloud, and PC (Steam and BattleNet).

#IGN #SeaofThieves #Rare
title: Sea of Thieves - Official Season 17 Content Update Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Nintendo just increased prices on nearly every piece of Switch hardware and accessories in the United States. From the base Nintendo Switch, OLED, and Lite models to even the Nintendo Sound Clock, nothing was spared.

#IGN #gaming  #Nintendo
title: Nintendo Hikes Prices in the United States - NVC Clips

author: IGN
description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch! This week Max and Daemon are joined by Nintendo Voice Chat's Logan Plant to discuss Nintendo's recent price hikes on Switch 1 hardware and some accessories. They also look at the sales race between the Switch 1 and the PlayStation 2, for the title of Most Units Sold. The PS2 currently sits at just over 160 million consoles sold over its lifetime, with the Switch 1 in second place with around 153 million. Did Nintendo fumble their chances of catching up to, or even beating Sony? Plus we have last week's poll results, and a new poll for you to vote on at IGN.com.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Did Nintendo Just Lose Its Chance to Beat the PS2? - Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description: Watch the Story Deep Dive for Cronos: The New Dawn, the upcoming third-person survival horror game developed by Bloober Team. Join Lead Writer and Lead Narrative Designer Grzegorz Like and Producer Klaudia Sewera on the deep lore and narrative of Cronos: The New Dawn. Players will experience a thrilling story centering on answering the lingering questions of humanity's fate alongside the true nature of the Traveler. Cronos: The New Dawn is launching on September 5 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: Cronos: The New Dawn - Official Story Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Yacht Club Games' highly anticipated title, Mina the Hollower, was recently released in the form of a demo on Nintendo Switch 2. Taking major inspiration from top down The Legend Zelda-style puzzle games, Mina the Hollower looks to feed your nostalgia with a game that looks like it was made for the NES. Here's 34 minutues of gameplay of the newest game from the developers of Shovel Knight.

#IGN #Gaming

author: IGN
description: Check out the Community Mods Launch Trailer for Doom Eternal, the hit action first-person shooter developed by Id Software. Players on PC can now gain access to over 650 community-created mods that allow players to browse, download, like, and boot up hundreds of mods made by the DOOM community. From faster movement, enhanced difficulty, weapons, and more, to tweak and utilize in Doom Eternal. Community Mods for Doom Eternal are available now for PC (Steam).
title: Doom Eternal - Official Community Mods Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Mafia: The Old Country reviewed by Luke Reilly on PC. Also available on  Xbox Series X|S and PlayStation 5.

"Mafia: The Old Country is an effective return to the linear and tightly story-driven format of the original Mafia and Mafia II. It doesn’t reinvent stealth, and there’s nothing especially remarkable about its typical third-person cover shooting – but with great writing, excellent vocal performances, and a wonderful eye and ear for detail, The Old Country is a potent and immersive time machine to a rarely explored era. This may be the Sicilian cuisine talking, as I’ve never played anything with quite as much Italian fruit and food on show, but I think the Mafia games might have established themselves as the arancini balls of the business. That is, crusty on the outside, but on the inside they’re dense, tasty, and a little cheesy – and, if you keep bringing them out, I’m going to keep going back to the buffet until the kitchen runs dry."

#IGN #Gaming
title: Mafia: The Old Country Review

author: IGN
description:

author: IGN
description: Check out the Launch Trailer for The House of The Dead 2: Remake, a remake of the classic arcade rail shooter developed by MegaPixel Studio. Embody the lone roles of secret agents James or Gary in an all-out assault against the undead with upgraded features and gameplay for the modern era. The House of The Dead 2: Remake is available now for Nintendo Switch and PC (Steam), with the game coming soon to PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, and Xbox Series X|S.
title: The House of The Dead 2: Remake - Official Launch Trailer
